1583180.name: Super Vili
1583180.description:
Help minister of health destroy deadly virus! Finish 21 levels in this 2D action euro platformer, collect stuff that fell from the truck, shoot masks on virus mutations or squish them all!

Controls:
MOVE - ARROWS or A and D keys
JUMP - SPACEBAR (KEY) or L1, L2, Y or B button
FIRE - LCTRL (KEY) or R1, R2, X or A button
RUN - HOLD FIRE ACTION
PAUSE GAME - ESC or P (KEY) or START button

Hints:
- masks are not 100% efficient
- use JUMP action on Game Over screen to fast RETRY
